block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Dog with a Bark. This Origami Barking Dog is designed by Paul Jackson. It's really fun to play with. Less than a minute origami. As usual, Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Paul Jackson
block_list.body:

  • Barking Dog by Paul Jackson
  • Hawk by Paul Jackson

  • Space Dart by Paul Jackson
  • Stealth Wing by Paul Jackson
